title: Instalockers
body: Someone needs to do something about people that do not call their lanes in Blind Pick. I'm getting annoyed by the ammount of minutes I have to wait in a waiting line because I dodged a game to avoid having 3 tops or no adc etc.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: blind pick has no rules that say you must call roles, etc. it's just courtesy.
lol just had one who instalocked tahm kench top when my friend called top. Ends up trolling at the end of the game cause he gives up on winning.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}  ikr fml I do the same but d!ck heads have no brain mate, poor us
